mapper.select: SELECT f.id, f.content, f.image, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM feed_interactions WHERE feed_id = f.id AND interaction_type = 'like') AS `like_count`, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM feed_interactions WHERE feed_id = f.id AND interaction_type = 'comment') AS `comment`, f.created_at, u.id AS user_id, u.nickname, u.profile_image FROM feeds f JOIN users u ON f.user_id = u.id WHERE CASE WHEN #{userId} = 0 THEN TRUE ELSE f.user_id = #{userId} END ORDER BY f.created_at DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO feeds (content, image, routine_id, user_id) VALUES (#{content}, #{images}, #{routineId}, #{userId});
